name: datawakefirefoxaddon
description: An add-on for the Tor/Firefox Browser that enables the DataWake.

preferences.name: datawakeDeploymentUrl
preferences.title: Datawake Deployment Address
preferences.description: (Required) Sets the current Datawake instance address.

preferences.name: proxyHost
preferences.title: Datawake Deployment Address IP
preferences.description: (Required) Sets the proxy ip address for sending side requests through Tor.

preferences.name: proxyPort
preferences.title: Datawake Deployment Address PORT
preferences.description: (Required) Sets the proxy port for sending side requests through Tor.

preferences.name: useGoogleAuth
preferences.title: Use Google Authentication
preferences.description: (Optional) Tells the Add-on to use Google Auth.

preferences.name: googleClientId
preferences.title: The Google Auth Client ID
preferences.description: (Required if Google Auth is checked) Sets the client id that should be used when using Google Auth.

preferences.name: googleClientSecret
preferences.title: The Google Auth Client Secret
preferences.description: (Required if Google Auth is checked) Sets the client secret that should be used when using Google Auth.
